remarks: Closure of an ordered pair (vector) member of a value of isomorphism H. (Contributed by NM, 26-Sep-2014.)
statement:
dihopcl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
dihopcl.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dihopcl.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihopcl.e $e |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihopcl.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihopcl.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
dihopcl.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
dihopcl.y $e |- ( ph -> <. F , S >. e. ( I ` X ) ) $.
dihopcl $p |- ( ph -> ( F e. T /\ S e. E ) ) $.
